oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Data for: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Armstrong, Michael
Paulina de la Mata
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dataset containing peak table information for a study discriminating between the odiferous profiles of cotton and polyester fabrics. Collected on a Comprehensive 2-Dimensional Gas Chromatography - Time-of-Flight Mass Spectrometry (GCxGC-TOFMS) instrument. Used in the paper: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric", for testing new data analysis strategies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chemistry
